Isabella Rodriguez.description: conversing about a Valentine's Day party at the cafe, where Isabella and Maria are discussing the details and expressing their excitement for the event. @ <persona> Maria Lopez
chat: Isabella Rodriguez
Hi Maria! How are you doing? Are you studying for your physics exam?
Maria Lopez
Hey Isabella! I'm doing well, thank you. Yes, I'm studying for my physics exam. How about you? How are things going for you?
Isabella Rodriguez
I'm actually getting ready for a Valentine's Day party at the cafe tomorrow. I hope you can join us!
Maria Lopez
That sounds like fun! I'd love to join the Valentine's Day party at the cafe tomorrow. What time does it start?
Isabella Rodriguez
The Valentine's Day party at the cafe starts at 5pm tomorrow.
Maria Lopez
Great! I'll make sure to be there at 5pm tomorrow for the Valentine's Day party. Do I need to bring anything?
Isabella Rodriguez
No need to bring anything, Maria. Just come and enjoy the party!
Maria Lopez
Thank you, Isabella! I'm really looking forward to the Valentine's Day party at the cafe.
Isabella Rodriguez
Is there anything specific you would like to see or do at the Valentine's Day party?
Maria Lopez
I'm actually really excited to see the decorations and try some of the special Valentine's Day menu items!
Isabella Rodriguez

I'm glad to hear that, Maria! I've been working hard to make the cafe look festive for the party. I hope you enjoy the decorations! And don't worry, we have a special Valentine's Day menu prepared, so you'll get to try some delicious treats. See you tomorrow at 5pm!
Maria Lopez
Is there a dress code for the party?
Isabella Rodriguez
There's no dress code for the party, Maria. Just come as you are and have a good time!
Maria Lopez
By the way, is there going to be any live music or entertainment at the party?
Isabella Rodriguez
Yes, we have a local band coming to perform at the party! They will be playing some romantic tunes throughout the evening.
Maria Lopez
That's great! I love live music. I can't wait to hear the local band play some romantic tunes at the party!
